name: Yunnb Friends
description:
Yunnb Friends is a RPG friend making game.

Its pretty short, but I hope you enjoy as it is my first game.

"Cyrus is enjoying his time at the beach, when he's on his way home

he bumps into someone, and wants to make a new friend."

If you run into any errors (such as game not loading, or text is unreadable) try

installing the RPG Maker 2003 RTP
